soot.jimple.infoflow.android.callbacks.filters

Class ApplicationCallbackFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • soot.jimple.infoflow.android.callbacks.filters.ApplicationCallbackFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICallbackFilter

    public class ApplicationCallbackFilter
extends Object
implements ICallbackFilter
    A callback filter that restricts application callbacks to ComponentCallbacks and ActivityLifecycleCallsbacks.
    Author:
    Steven Arzt

    • Method Detail

      • accepts

        public boolean accepts(soot.SootClass component,
                       soot.SootClass callbackHandler)
        Description copied from interface: ICallbackFilter
        Checks whether the given callback handler is usable in the given Android component
        Specified by:
        accepts in interface ICallbackFilter
        Parameters:
        component - The component at whose runtime the callback is to be invoked
        callbackHandler - The class containing the callback implementation
        Returns:
        True if the filter accepts the callback to be registered, otherwise false
